definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Ob:Ob 20 LXX Efraqa, Qa Safarad; loc. Dub.; Spieg:APK 242 Nö:ZMG xxxiii (1879), 323 Che:Founders 312 Say:Monuments 483 al. cp. Sparda in Asia Minor (= Sardis ? Behistun:i, 15 Persep. 1:12 NR:a 28); Schr:COTad loc.(cf. KGF 116 ff.) Dl:Par 249, cf. GASm:12 Proph. ii. 176, cp. Šaparda in SW. Media (time of Sargon); a Saparda also NE. from Nineveh (Esarhaddon's time), cf. Knudtzon:Ass. Gebete, Nos. 8, 11, 30.
